adverts.title: Senior Software Developer
adverts.context: Looking for an experienced software developer to join our dynamic team. Responsibilities include developing and maintaining high-quality software applications.
adverts.acceptText: Congratulations! You have been accepted for the Senior Software Developer position.
adverts.rejectText: Thank you for applying. Unfortunately, you have not been selected for the Senior Software Developer position.

adverts.title: Project Manager
adverts.context: Seeking a skilled project manager with experience in managing large-scale environmental projects. Must have excellent leadership skills and the ability to meet tight deadlines.
adverts.acceptText: Congratulations! You have been accepted for the Project Manager position.
adverts.rejectText: Thank you for applying. Unfortunately, you have not been selected for the Project Manager position.

adverts.title: Registered Nurse
adverts.context: Immediate opening for a registered nurse to provide quality patient care in a fast-paced emergency room setting. Candidates must have a valid nursing license.
adverts.acceptText: Congratulations! You have been accepted for the Registered Nurse position.
adverts.rejectText: Thank you for applying. Unfortunately, you have not been selected for the Registered Nurse position.
